games.title: Short Life
games.description: Short Life is an interesting ragdoll game. Dodge obstacles and complete levels while trying to keep your character alive.

games.title: Madalin Stunt Cars 2
games.description: Madalin Stunt Cars 2 is an amazing 3D car driving game featuring a wide range of sports cars and thrilling stunts.

games.title: Shell Shockers
games.description: Shell Shockers is a multiplayer first-person-shooter game featuring egg characters armed with powerful weapons.
